title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama; shows streaming responses and keeps session history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node selectors.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerised (CPU & CUDA).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template combining Ollama LLM, Chroma vector store and LangChain for local Q&A.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that pipes selected notes to an Ollama model for summarisation or Q&A.

title: ollama-npm (npmjs package)
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript client published on npm; zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS.

title: ollama-py (PyPI)
summary: Official Python client distributed on PyPI; supports chat, generate, embed, pull and list operations.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android compatible) with fluent API and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous clients with chat completions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model with slash commands.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, model files, integrations and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
